info.name: WorkFlowy Better Starred Page Viewer
info.description:
Moves and resizes WorkFlowy's starred pages selector to the left in a vertical list.

• Easier to read text
• More text to read
• View more starred pages without scrolling
• Less travel when using the mouse
• Works with the keyboard shortcut*
info.additionalInfo:
* If the number of starred pages requires scrolling, the mouse is required. To scroll, use the mouse wheel or click and drag on the scroll bar.

** Inspired by "WorkFlowy - Starred pages as a list" by DaveJamesMiller
